thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com | 3 of 253
thread.title: Craig

author: Craig
title: Craig
text:
Excellent service and they will bail you out if you have problems with the install and need a replacement. I had a problem and damaged my decals, but the guys at DIY sent me a free replacement, which worked great!
I will certainly give them my business to them again, and highly recommend them to others. Very fast turn around time and the materials that they use are high quality.
